00049         
00050         int C74_EXPORT main(void)
00051         {       
00052                 t_class *c;
00053                 
00054                 c = class_new("OMax.data", (method)OMax_data_new, (method)OMax_data_free, (long)sizeof(t_OMax_data), 
00055                                           0L /* leave NULL!! */, A_GIMME, 0);
00056                 
00057                 // assistance
00058                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_assist,"assist",A_CANT, 0); 
00059                 
00060                 // input methods
00061                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_size, "size", 0);
00062                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_init, "init", 0);
00063                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_reset, "reset", 0);
00064                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_type, "type", 0);
00065                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_write, "write", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00066                 class_addmethod(c, (method)OMax_data_read, "read", A_DEFSYM, 0);
00067         
00068         // noDelete Attribute
00069         CLASS_ATTR_CHAR(c, "NoDelete", 0, t_OMax_data, noDelete);
00070         CLASS_ATTR_STYLE_LABEL(c, "NoDelete", 0, "onoff", (char*)"Do Not Erase Data");
00071                          
00072                 class_register(CLASS_BOX, c); /* CLASS_NOBOX */
00073                 OMax_data_class = c;
00074                 
00075                 return 0;
00076         }

00083         void *OMax_data_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00084         {
00085                 t_OMax_data *x = NULL;
00086                 
00087                 if ((x = (t_OMax_data *)object_alloc(OMax_data_class)))
00088                 {
00089                         // outlets
00090                         x->out0 = outlet_new(x, NULL);
00091             
00092                         if (argc == 0)
00093                                 object_error((t_object *)x,"Missing arguments");
00094                         else
00095                         {
00096                                 if (argv->a_type!= A_SYM)
00097                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"First argument must be a symbol (name of the data)");
00098                                 else
00099                                 {
00101                                         
00102                                         // get oracle name
00103                                         x->oname = atom_getsym(argv);
00104                                         
00105                                         // set data name
00106                                         x->dataname = OMax_data_name(x->oname);
00107                                         if (x->dataname->s_thing!=NULL)
00108                                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "Name %s already used",x->oname->s_name);
00109                                         else
00110                                         {
00111                                                 x->dataname->s_thing = (t_object*)x;
00112                                                 x->nbcoeffs = 0;
00113                                                 
00115                                                 x->datatype = LETTERS;
00116                                                 string datatype = "LETTERS";
00117                                                 if (argc < 2 || (argv+1)->a_type!=A_SYM)
00118                                                         object_post((t_object *)x,"No data type, using LETTERS");
00119                                                 else
00120                                                 {
00121                                                         if (atom_getsym(argv+1) == gensym("MIDI_MONO"))
00122                                                         {
00123                                                                 x->datatype = MIDI_MONO;
00124                                                                 datatype = "MIDI_MONO";
00125                                                         }
00126                                                         else { 
00127                                                                 if (atom_getsym(argv+1) == gensym("SPECTRAL"))
00128                                                                 {
00129                                                                         x->datatype = SPECTRAL;
00130                                                                         datatype = "SPECTRAL";
00131                                                                         if (atom_getlong(argv+2))
00132                                                                                 x->nbcoeffs = atom_getlong(argv+2);
00133                                                                         else
00134                                                                         {
00135                                                                                 x->nbcoeffs = 7;
00136                                                                                 object_post((t_object *)x, "Missing number of coefficients for %s, assuming 7",x->oname->s_name);
00137                                                                         }
00138                                                                 }
00139                                                                 else {
00140                                                                         if (atom_getsym(argv+1) == gensym("MIDI_POLY"))
00141                                                                         {
00142                                                                                 x->datatype = MIDI_POLY;
00143                                                                                 datatype = "MIDI_POLY";
00144                                                                         }
00145                                                                         else { 
00146                                                                                 if (atom_getsym(argv+1) == gensym("LETTERS"));
00147                                                                                 else
00148                                                                                         object_error((t_object *)x,"Type %s undefined, using LETTERS",atom_getsym(argv+1)->s_name);
00149                                                                         }
00150                                                                 }
00151                                                         }
00152                                                 }
00153                                                 if (datatype == "SPECTRAL")
00154                                                         object_post((t_object *)x,"Data %s of type %s declared with %ld coefficients",x->oname->s_name, datatype.c_str(),x->nbcoeffs);
00155                                                 else
00156                                                         object_post((t_object *)x,"Data %s of type %s declared",x->oname->s_name, datatype.c_str());
00157                                                 
00158                                         }
00159                                 }
00160                         }
00161                         // write flags
00162                         x->wflag = 0;
00163                         x->readcount = 0;
00164                         x->noDelete = 0;
00165                         
00166             // process attr args, if any
00167             attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);
00168             
00169                         // color
00170                         t_object *box;
00171                         t_jrgba colorvals;
00172                         jrgba_set(&colorvals, 0.30, 1.0, 0.15, 1.0);
00173                         object_obex_lookup((t_object *)x, gensym("#B"), &box);
00174                         jbox_set_color(box, &colorvals);
00175                 }
00176                 return (x);
00177         }
00178         
00181         void OMax_data_free(t_OMax_data *x)
00182         {
00183         if (x->oname!= NULL)
00184         {
00185             ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&x->wflag);
00187             if (x->dataname->s_thing == (t_object *)x)
00188                 x->dataname->s_thing = NULL;
00189             
00190             if (!(x->noDelete))
00191             {
00192                 switch (x->datatype)
00193                 {
00194                     case SPECTRAL:
00195                         x->data.freestates<O_spectral>();
00196                         break;
00197                     case MIDI_MONO:
00198                         x->data.freestates<O_MIDI_mono>();
00199                         break;
00200                     case MIDI_POLY:
00201                         x->data.freestates<O_MIDI_poly>();
00202                         break;
00203                     default:
00204                         x->data.freestates<O_char>();
00205                 }
00206             }
00207         }
00208         }
00209         
00213         void OMax_data_assist(t_OMax_data *x, void *b, long io, long index, char *s)
00214         {
00215                 switch (io)
00216                 {
00217             case 1: // inlets
00218                                 switch (index)
00219                         {
00220                                 case 0: // leftmost
00221                                         sprintf(s, "messages (init, reset, size, type, write)");
00222                                         break;
00223                         }
00224                 break;
00225             case 2: // outlets
00226                                 switch (index)
00227                         {
00228                                 case 0:
00229                                         sprintf(s, "Anything you asked");
00230                                         break;
00231                         }
00232                                 break;
00233                 }
00234         }

00244         void OMax_data_size(t_OMax_data *x)
00245         {
00246                 outlet_int(x->out0,(long)x->data.get_size());
00247         }
00248         
00252         void OMax_data_init(t_OMax_data *x)
00253         {
00254                 switch (x->datatype)
00255                 {
00256                         case SPECTRAL:
00257                                 x->data.start<O_spectral>();
00258                                 break;
00259                         case MIDI_MONO:
00260                                 x->data.start<O_MIDI_mono>();
00261                                 break;
00262                         case MIDI_POLY:
00263                                 x->data.start<O_MIDI_poly>();
00264                                 break;
00265                         default:
00266                                 x->data.start<O_char>();
00267                 }
00268         }
00269         
00273         void OMax_data_reset(t_OMax_data *x)
00274         {
00275                 ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&x->wflag);
00277                 if (x->noDelete)
00278                 {
00279                         x->data.clear_vect();
00280                 }
00281                 else
00282                 {
00283                         switch (x->datatype)
00284                         {
00285                                 case SPECTRAL:
00286                                         x->data.freestates<O_spectral>();
00287                                         break;
00288                                 case MIDI_MONO:
00289                                         x->data.freestates<O_MIDI_mono>();
00290                                         break;
00291                                 case MIDI_POLY:
00292                                         x->data.freestates<O_MIDI_poly>();
00293                                         break;
00294                                 default:
00295                                         x->data.freestates<O_char>();
00296                         }
00297                 }
00298                 x->data.reset_D2S();
00299                 x->data.reset_S2D();
00300                 ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&x->wflag);
00301                 outlet_int(x->out0,(long)x->data.get_size());
00302         }
00303         
00307         void OMax_data_type(t_OMax_data *x)
00308         {
00309                 outlet_int(x->out0, (long)x->datatype);
00310         }
00311         
00315         void OMax_data_write(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s)
00316         {
00317                 if (x->data.get_size())
00318                         defer(x, (method)OMax_data_dowrite, s, 0, NULL);
00319                 else
00320                         object_post((t_object*)x, "Data of oracle %s empty",x->oname->s_name);
00321         }
00322         
00326         void OMax_data_read(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s)
00327         {
00328                 defer(x, (method)OMax_data_doread, s, 0, NULL);
00329                 outlet_int(x->out0,(long)x->data.get_size()-1);
00330         }

00339         t_symbol * OMax_data_name(t_symbol * oname)
00340         {
00341                 char dataname[128];
00342                 strcpy(dataname,oname->s_name);
00344                 strcat(dataname,"_data");
00345                 return gensym(dataname);
00346         }
00347         
00351         void OMax_data_dowrite(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom* argv)
00352         {
00353                 short err = 0;
00354                 t_fourcc filetype = 'TEXT';
00355                 t_fourcc outtype = 'TEXT';
00356                 short path, newpath = 0;
00357                 short numtypes = 1;
00358                 char* foldername = NULL;
00359                 char temp[256];
00360                 char fullpath[MAX_PATH_CHARS];
00361                 char filename[MAX_FILENAME_CHARS];
00362                 
00363                 if (s == gensym(""))
00364                 {      // if no argument supplied, ask for file
00365                         if (saveasdialog_extended(filename, &newpath, &outtype, &filetype, numtypes))     // non-zero: user cancelled
00366                                 return;
00367                 }
00368                 else
00369                 {
00370                         strcpy(fullpath, s->s_name);
00371                         path_frompotentialpathname(fullpath, &path, filename);
00372                         foldername = strrchr(fullpath, '/');
00373                         if (foldername)
00374                         {
00375                                 *foldername = 0;
00376                                 foldername = strrchr(fullpath, '/');
00377                                 if (foldername)
00378                                 {
00379                                         *foldername = 0;
00380                                         foldername++;
00381                                         err = path_frompathname(fullpath, &path, temp);
00382                                         if (!err)
00383                                                 err = path_createfolder(path, foldername, &newpath);
00384                                         if (err)
00385                                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "error creating folder", err);
00386                                 }
00387                                 else
00388                                         path_frompathname(fullpath, &newpath, temp);
00389                         }
00390                         else
00391                         {
00392                                 newpath = path_getdefault();
00393                                 strcpy(filename, s->s_name);
00394                         }
00395                 }
00396                 OMax_data_writefile(x, filename, newpath);
00397         }
00398         
00402         void OMax_data_writefile(t_OMax_data *x, char *filename, short path)
00403         {
00404                 char err;
00405                 int* note_data = NULL;
00406                 float* sp_data = NULL;
00407                 long i = 0;
00408                 long idx = 0;
00409                 long nbstates = x->data.get_size();
00410                 
00411                 char letter[2]; letter[1] = NULL;
00412                 
00413                 O_label* current;
00414                 
00415                 t_symbol* sym_state = gensym("state");
00416                 t_symbol* sym_time = gensym("time");
00417                 t_symbol* sym_seg = gensym("seg");
00418                 t_symbol* sym_letter = gensym("letter");
00419                 t_symbol* sym_note = gensym("note");
00420                 t_symbol* sym_pitch = gensym("pitch");
00421                 t_symbol* sym_coeffs = gensym("coeffs");
00422                 t_symbol* sym_slice = gensym("slice");
00423                 t_symbol* sym_notes = gensym("notes");
00424                 
00425                 t_atom* datab = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(nbstates*sizeof(t_atom));
00426                 t_atom* array = NULL;
00427                 /*if (x->nbcoeffs>2)
00428                         atom_alloc_array(x->nbcoeffs, &i, &array, &err);
00429                 else
00430                         atom_alloc_array(3, &i, &array, &err);*/
00431                 
00432                 t_dictionary* d;
00433                 t_dictionary* ditem;
00434                 
00435                 d = dictionary_new(); //main directory
00436                 
00437                 // name
00438                 dictionary_appendsym(d, gensym("name"), x->oname);
00439                 
00440                 switch (x->datatype)
00441                 {
00442                         case MIDI_POLY:
00443             {
00444                                 // vars & alloc
00445                                 t_dictionary* notedic;
00446                                 atom_alloc_array(5, &i, &array, &err);
00447                                 t_atom* notesarray = (t_atom*)sysmem_newptr(MAX_NOTES*sizeof(t_atom));
00448                                 
00449                                 dictionary_appendsym(d, gensym("typeID"), gensym("MIDI_POLY"));
00450                                 for (idx=0; idx<nbstates; idx++)
00451                                 {
00452                                         current = x->data[idx];
00453                                         ditem = dictionary_new();
00454                                         // state number
00455                                         dictionary_appendlong(ditem, sym_state, current->get_statenb());
00456                                         // time data (buffer date and duration)
00457                                         atom_setlong(array, current->get_bufferef());
00458                                         atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_duration());
00459                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_time, 2, array);
00460                                         // segmentation data (phrase and section)
00461                                         atom_setlong(array, current->get_section());
00462                                         atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_phrase());
00463                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_seg, 2, array);
00464                                         // slice data
00465                                         atom_setfloat(array, ((O_MIDI_poly*)current)->get_vpitch());
00466                                         atom_setfloat(array+1, ((O_MIDI_poly*)current)->get_mvelocity());
00467                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_slice, 2, array);
00468                                         // notes
00469                                         list<O_MIDI_note> notes = ((O_MIDI_poly*)current)->get_notes();
00470                                         list<O_MIDI_note>::iterator notit;
00471                                         i = 0;
00472                                         for (notit = notes.begin(); notit != notes.end() ; notit++)
00473                                         {
00474                                                 notedic = dictionary_new();
00475                                                 note_data = notit->get_note(note_data);
00476                                                 atom_setlong_array(5, array, 5, (t_atom_long*)note_data);
00477                                                 dictionary_appendatoms(notedic, sym_note, 3, array);
00478                                                 dictionary_appendatoms(notedic, sym_time, 2, array+3);
00479                                                 atom_setobj(&notesarray[i++], notedic);
00480                                         }
00481                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_notes, i, notesarray);
00482                                         // add to the data array
00483                                         atom_setobj(&datab[idx], ditem);
00484                                 }
00485                                 break;
00486             }
00487                         case SPECTRAL:
00488             {
00489                                 // alloc
00490                                 atom_alloc_array(x->nbcoeffs, &i, &array, &err);
00491                                 
00492                                 dictionary_appendsym(d, gensym("typeID"), gensym("SPECTRAL"));
00493                                 
00494                                 for (idx=0; idx<nbstates; idx++)
00495                                 {
00496                                         current = x->data[idx];
00497                                         ditem = dictionary_new();
00498                                         // state number
00499                                         dictionary_appendlong(ditem, sym_state, current->get_statenb());
00500                                         // time data (buffer date and duration)
00501                                         atom_setlong(array, current->get_bufferef());
00502                                         atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_duration());
00503                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_time, 2, array);
00504                                         // segmentation data (phrase and section)
00505                                         atom_setlong(array, current->get_section());
00506                                         atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_phrase());
00507                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_seg, 2, array);
00508                                         // pitch
00509                                         dictionary_appendlong(ditem, sym_pitch, ((O_spectral*)current)->get_pitch());
00510                                         // MFCCs
00511                                         sp_data = (float*)calloc(x->nbcoeffs, sizeof(float));
00512                                         sp_data = ((O_spectral*)current)->get_coeffs(sp_data);
00513                                         atom_setfloat_array(x->nbcoeffs, array, x->nbcoeffs, sp_data);
00514                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_coeffs, x->nbcoeffs, array);
00515                                         // add to the data array
00516                                         atom_setobj(&datab[idx], ditem);
00517                                 }
00518                                 break;
00519             }
00520                         case MIDI_MONO:
00521             {
00522                                 // alloc
00523                                 atom_alloc_array(3, &i, &array, &err);
00524                                 
00525                                 dictionary_appendsym(d, gensym("typeID"), gensym("MIDI_MONO"));
00526                                 
00527                                 for (idx=0; idx<nbstates; idx++)
00528                                 {
00529                                         current = x->data[idx];
00530                                         ditem = dictionary_new();
00531                                         // state number
00532                                         dictionary_appendlong(ditem, sym_state, current->get_statenb());
00533                                         // time data (buffer date and duration)
00534                                         atom_setlong(array, current->get_bufferef());
00535                                         atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_duration());
00536                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_time, 2, array);
00537                                         // segmentation data (phrase and section)
00538                                         atom_setlong(array, current->get_section());
00539                                         atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_phrase());
00540                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_seg, 2, array);
00541                                         // note
00542                                         note_data = ((O_MIDI_mono*)current)->get_data(note_data);
00543                                         atom_setlong_array(3, array, 3, (t_atom_long*)note_data);
00544                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_note, 3, array);
00545                                         // add to the data array
00546                                         atom_setobj(&datab[idx], ditem);
00547                                 }
00548                                 break;
00549             }
00550                         default:
00551             {
00552                                 // alloc
00553                                 atom_alloc_array(2, &i, &array, &err);
00554                                 
00555                                 dictionary_appendsym(d, gensym("typeID"), gensym("LETTERS"));
00556                                 
00557                                 for (idx=0; idx<nbstates; idx++)
00558                                 {
00559                                         current = x->data[idx];
00560                                         ditem = dictionary_new();
00561                                         // state number
00562                                         dictionary_appendlong(ditem, sym_state, current->get_statenb());
00563                                         // time data (buffer date and duration)
00564                                         atom_setlong(array, current->get_bufferef());
00565                                         atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_duration());
00566                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_time, 2, array);
00567                                         // segmentation data (phrase and section)
00568                                         atom_setlong(array, current->get_section());
00569                                         atom_setlong(array+1, current->get_phrase());
00570                                         dictionary_appendatoms(ditem, sym_seg, 2, array);
00571                                         // letter
00572                                         letter[0] = ((O_char*)current)->get_letter();
00573                                         dictionary_appendsym(ditem, sym_letter, gensym(letter));
00574                                         // add to the data array
00575                                         atom_setobj(&datab[idx], ditem);
00576                                 }
00577                                 break;
00578             }
00579                 }
00580                 dictionary_appendlong(d, gensym("type"), x->datatype);
00581                 if (x->datatype == 2)
00582                         dictionary_appendlong(d, gensym("#coeffs"), x->nbcoeffs);
00583                 dictionary_appendlong(d, gensym("size"), nbstates);
00584                 dictionary_appendatoms(d, gensym("data"), nbstates, datab);
00585                 
00586                 err = dictionary_write(d, filename, path);
00587                 if (err)
00588                         object_error((t_object*)x, "Error writing file");
00589                 else 
00590                         object_post((t_object*)x, "Written data of oracle %s in file %s", x->oname->s_name, filename);
00591 
00592                 
00593                 sysmem_freeptr(array);
00594                 sysmem_freeptr(datab);
00595                 free(note_data);
00596                 free(sp_data);
00597                 object_free(d);
00598         }
00599         
00600         void OMax_data_doread(t_OMax_data *x, t_symbol *s)
00601         {
00602                 //char err;
00603                 short path;
00604                 int date = 0;
00605                 t_atom_long datatype, t_size, nbcoeffs;
00606         long size;
00607                 long i, idx;
00608                 char filename[MAX_PATH_CHARS];
00609                 t_fourcc type = FOUR_CHAR_CODE('JSON');
00610                 t_symbol *symdata = NULL;
00611                 t_atom *data = NULL;
00612                 t_dictionary *d = NULL;
00613                 
00614                 if (s == gensym(""))
00615                 {
00616                         if (open_dialog(filename, &path, &type, &type, 1))
00617                                 return;
00618                 }
00619                 else
00620                 {
00621                         strcpy(filename, s->s_name);
00622                         if (locatefile_extended(filename, &path, &type, &type, 1))
00623                         {
00624                                 object_error((t_object *)x, "can't find file %s", filename);
00625                                 return;
00626                         }
00627                 }
00628                 
00629                 dictionary_read(filename, path, &d);
00630                 if (d)
00631                 {
00632                         dictionary_getsym(d, gensym("name"), &symdata);
00633                         dictionary_getlong(d, gensym("type"), &datatype);
00634                         if (datatype!=x->datatype)
00635                         {
00636                                 object_error((t_object*)x, "data type mismatch");
00637                                 return;
00638                         }
00639                         
00640                         if (x->datatype == 2 )
00641                         {
00642                                 dictionary_getlong(d, gensym("#coeffs"), &nbcoeffs);
00643                                 if (nbcoeffs != x->nbcoeffs)
00644                                 {
00645                                         x->nbcoeffs = nbcoeffs;
00646                                         object_post((t_object*)x, "Number of coefficients changed");
00647                                         object_post((t_object*)x,"New number : %d coefficients", x->nbcoeffs);
00648                                 }
00649                         }
00650                         
00651                         OMax_data_reset(x);
00652                         
00653                         t_symbol* sym_state = gensym("state");
00654                         t_symbol* sym_time = gensym("time");
00655                         t_symbol* sym_seg = gensym("seg");
00656                         t_symbol* sym_letter = gensym("letter");
00657                         t_symbol* sym_note = gensym("note");
00658                         t_symbol* sym_pitch = gensym("pitch");
00659                         t_symbol* sym_coeffs = gensym("coeffs");
00660                         t_symbol* sym_slice = gensym("slice");
00661                         t_symbol* sym_notes = gensym("notes");
00662                         
00663                         
00664                         dictionary_getlong(d, gensym("size"), &t_size);
00665             size = t_size; // possible perte de prcision (dpendant de la machine)
00666                         dictionary_getatoms(d, gensym("data"), &size, &data);
00667                         
00668                         if (x->readcount==0 && x->wflag==0)
00669                         {
00670                                 // vars
00671                                 t_atom_long statenb;
00672                                 t_atom *array = NULL;
00673                                 t_dictionary *ditem = NULL;
00674                                 
00675                                 // alloc
00676                                 /*if (x->nbcoeffs>2)
00677                                         atom_alloc_array(x->nbcoeffs, &i, &array, &err);
00678                                 else
00679                                         atom_alloc_array(3, &i, &array, &err);*/
00680                                 
00681                                 ATOMIC_INCREMENT(&x->wflag);
00682                                 switch (datatype)
00683                                 {
00684                                         case 3: // MIDI_poly
00685                                                 for (idx=1; idx<size; idx++)
00686                                                 {
00687                                                         int j;
00688                                                         long k,l;
00689                                                         O_MIDI_poly* newstate;
00690                                                         t_atom* notes = NULL;
00691                                                         t_atom* notetime = NULL;
00692                                                         t_dictionary* notedic = NULL;
00693                                                         list<O_MIDI_note> notelist;
00694                                                         ditem = (t_dictionary*)atom_getobj(&data[idx]);
00695                                                         if (ditem)
00696                                                         {
00697                                                                 newstate = new O_MIDI_poly();
00698                                                                 
00699                                                                 // get state number
00700                                                                 dictionary_getlong(ditem, sym_state, &statenb);
00701                                                                 newstate->set_statenb(statenb);
00702                                                                 
00703                                                                 i = 0;
00704                                                                 // get time data (buffer date & duration)
00705                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_time, &i, &array);
00706                                                                 if (i==2)
00707                                                                 {
00708                                                                         date = atom_getlong(array);
00709                                                                         newstate->set_bufferef(date);
00710                                                                         newstate->set_duration(atom_getlong(array+1));
00711                                                                 }
00712                                                                 
00713                                                                 i = 0;
00714                                                                 // get segmentation data (phrase and section)
00715                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_seg, &i, &array);
00716                                                                 if (i==2)
00717                                                                 {
00718                                                                         newstate->set_section(atom_getlong(array));
00719                                                                         newstate->set_phrase(atom_getlong(array+1));
00720                                                                 }
00721                                                                 
00722                                                                 i = 0;
00723                                                                 // get slice data (virtual pitch & mean velocity)
00724                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_slice, &i, &array);
00725                                                                 if (i==2)
00726                                                                 {
00727                                                                         newstate->set_vpitch(atom_getfloat(array));
00728                                                                         newstate->set_mvelocity(atom_getfloat(array+1));
00729                                                                 }
00730                                                                 
00731                                                                 i = 0;
00732                                                                 // get notes
00733                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_notes, &i, &notes);
00734                                                                 for (j=0; j<i; j++)
00735                                                                 {
00736                                                                         notedic = (t_dictionary*)atom_getobj(&notes[j]);
00737                                                                         dictionary_getatoms(notedic, sym_note, &k, &array);
00738                                                                         dictionary_getatoms(notedic, sym_time, &l, &notetime);
00739                                                                         if (k==3 && l==2)
00740                                                                         {
00741                                                                                 O_MIDI_note newnote (atom_getlong(array), atom_getlong(array+1), atom_getlong(array+2), atom_getlong(notetime), atom_getlong(notetime+1));
00742                                                                                 notelist.push_back(newnote);
00743                                                                         }
00744                                                                         
00745                                                                 }
00746                                                                 newstate->set_notes(notelist);
00747                                                                 notelist.clear();
00748                                                                 
00749                                                                 // add to the data structure
00750                                                                 x->data.add<O_MIDI_poly>(date,(O_label*)newstate);
00751                                                         }
00752                                                 }
00753                                                 break;
00754                                                 
00755                                         case 2: // Spectral
00756                                                 for (idx=1; idx<size; idx++)
00757                                                 {
00758                                                         int j;
00759                                                         t_atom_long pitch;
00760                                                         list<float> coeffs;
00761                                                         O_spectral* newstate;
00762                                                         ditem = (t_dictionary*)atom_getobj(&data[idx]);
00763                                                         if (ditem)
00764                                                         {
00765                                                                 newstate = new O_spectral();
00766                                                                 
00767                                                                 // get state number
00768                                                                 dictionary_getlong(ditem, sym_state, &statenb);
00769                                                                 newstate->set_statenb(statenb);
00770                                                                 
00771                                                                 i = 0;
00772                                                                 // get time data (buffer date & duration)
00773                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_time, &i, &array);
00774                                                                 if (i==2)
00775                                                                 {
00776                                                                         date = atom_getlong(array);
00777                                                                         newstate->set_bufferef(date);
00778                                                                         newstate->set_duration(atom_getlong(array+1));
00779                                                                 }
00780                                                                 
00781                                                                 i = 0;
00782                                                                 // get segmentation data (phrase and section)
00783                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_seg, &i, &array);
00784                                                                 if (i==2)
00785                                                                 {
00786                                                                         newstate->set_section(atom_getlong(array));
00787                                                                         newstate->set_phrase(atom_getlong(array+1));
00788                                                                 }
00789                                                                 
00790                                                                 // get pitch
00791                                                                 dictionary_getlong(ditem, sym_pitch, &pitch);
00792                                                                 newstate->set_pitch(pitch);
00793                                                                 
00794                                                                 i = 0;
00795                                                                 // get spectral coefficients
00796                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_coeffs, &i, &array);
00797                                                                 if (i == x->nbcoeffs)
00798                                                                 {
00799                                                                         for (j=0; j<x->nbcoeffs; j++)
00800                                                                                 coeffs.push_back(atom_getfloat(&array[j]));
00801                                                                         newstate->set_coeffs(coeffs);
00802                                                                 }
00803                                                                 
00804                                                                 // add to the data structure
00805                                                                 x->data.add<O_spectral>(date,(O_label*)newstate);
00806                                                         }
00807                                                 }
00808                                                 break;
00809                                                 
00810                                         case 1: // MIDI_mono
00811                                                 for (idx=1; idx<size; idx++)
00812                                                 {
00813                                                         O_MIDI_mono* newstate;
00814                                                         ditem = (t_dictionary*)atom_getobj(&data[idx]);
00815                                                         if (ditem)
00816                                                         {
00817                                                                 newstate = new O_MIDI_mono();
00818                                                                 
00819                                                                 // get state number
00820                                                                 dictionary_getlong(ditem, sym_state, &statenb);
00821                                                                 newstate->set_statenb(statenb);
00822                                                                 
00823                                                                 i=0;
00824                                                                 // get note data (pitch, velocity, channel)
00825                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_note, &i, &array);
00826                                                                 if (i==3)
00827                                                                 {
00828                                                                         newstate->set_pitch(atom_getlong(array));
00829                                                                         newstate->set_velocity(atom_getlong(array+1));
00830                                                                         newstate->set_channel(atom_getlong(array+2));
00831                                                                 }
00832                                                                 
00833                                                                 i=0;
00834                                                                 // get time data (buffer date & duration)
00835                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_time, &i, &array);
00836                                                                 if (i==2)
00837                                                                 {
00838                                                                         date = atom_getlong(array);
00839                                                                         newstate->set_bufferef(date);
00840                                                                         newstate->set_duration(atom_getlong(array+1));
00841                                                                 }
00842                                                                 
00843                                                                 i = 0;
00844                                                                 // get segmentation data (phrase and section)
00845                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_seg, &i, &array);
00846                                                                 if (i==2)
00847                                                                 {
00848                                                                         newstate->set_section(atom_getlong(array));
00849                                                                         newstate->set_phrase(atom_getlong(array+1));
00850                                                                 }
00851                                                                 // add to the data structure
00852                                                                 x->data.add<O_MIDI_mono>(date,(O_label*)newstate);
00853                                                         }
00854                                                 }
00855                                                 break;
00856                                                 
00857                                         default: // Letters
00858                                                 for (idx=1; idx<size; idx++)
00859                                                 {
00860                                                         t_symbol* letter;
00861                                                         O_char* newstate;
00862                                                         ditem = (t_dictionary*)atom_getobj(&data[idx]);
00863                                                         if (ditem)
00864                                                         {
00865                                                                 // get letter and #state
00866                                                                 dictionary_getlong(ditem, sym_state, &statenb);
00867                                                                 dictionary_getsym(ditem, sym_letter, &letter);
00868                                                                 newstate = new O_char(letter->s_name[0]);
00869                                                                 newstate->set_statenb(statenb);
00870                                                                 
00871                                                                 // get time data (buffer date & duration)
00872                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_time, &i, &array);
00873                                                                 if (i==2)
00874                                                                 {
00875                                                                         date = atom_getlong(array);
00876                                                                         newstate->set_bufferef(date);
00877                                                                         newstate->set_duration(atom_getlong(array+1));
00878                                                                 }
00879                                                                 i = 0;
00880                                                                 
00881                                                                 // get segmentation data (phrase and section)
00882                                                                 dictionary_getatoms(ditem, sym_seg, &i, &array);
00883                                                                 if (i==2)
00884                                                                 {
00885                                                                         newstate->set_section(atom_getlong(array));
00886                                                                         newstate->set_phrase(atom_getlong(array+1));
00887                                                                 }
00888                                                                 // add to the data structure
00889                                                                 x->data.add<O_char>(date,(O_label*)newstate);
00890                                                         }
00891                                                 }
00892                                                 break;
00893                                 }
00894                                 ATOMIC_DECREMENT(&x->wflag);
00895                         }
00896             object_free(d);
00897                         object_post((t_object *)x, "Loaded data from oracle %s", symdata->s_name);
00898                 }
00899         }
00900         
00902         
00903 }
